title: [Health] University of Alberta researchers have developed a stem cell treatment that a study has found may be capable of curing diabetes in mice

[Health] Childhood lead exposure leads to structural changes in middle age brains. For each 5 micrograms per deciliter more lead they carried as children, the study participants lost an average of 2 IQ points by age 45. Findings come from a long-term study of more than 1,000 people
